content: the toasty handwarmer talca tangle 1 the 8 ply toasty handwarmer is designed for a beginner it will keep your hands warm through the winter while leaving your fingers and thumb free to do the important stuff like knit it s knitted as a square and then the side edges are sewn up into a tube leaving a gap for the thumb super quick and easy skills required cast on cast off knit purl sew in ends yarn quantity 50 grams of 8 ply yarn you can choose any 8 ply yarn that matches the required gauge wool or alpaca yarns are the warmest but use whatever 8 ply yarn you like size medium large width across palm 7-8cm 8-9cm gauge 22 stitches and 28 row to 10 cm in stocking stitch on 4mm needles note that knitting a gauge square is not essential for this pattern but is recommended if you re a beginner needles 3 75mm 1 pair 4mm 1 pair wool needle for sewing the ends in optional 2 stitch markers or safety pins pattern instructions make 2 alike one for each hand using 3 75mm needles cast on 41|45 stitches make sure you leave at least 15cm of yarn before the first cast on stitch as you will use this later for sewing up row 1 knit 1 *knit 1 purl 1** repeat from * to ** until the last stitch knit 1 row 2 knit 1 purl 1 repeat to end noting that last stitch will be a knit repeat row 1 and 2 3 times making 8 row of 1x1 rib change to 4mm needles row 1 knit row 2 purl copyright 2025 talca tangle 2 the above 2 row form stocking stitch repeat row 1 and 2 until you have knitted 32|36 row in total change back to 3 75mm needles knit 4 row of 1x1 rib as described above cast off loosely in rib make sure you leave at least a 15cm strand of yarn as you will use this for sewing up making up try on the handwarmer the longer ribbing should be at the bottom i e your wrist it may be helpful to use stitch markers or safety pins to hold it in place mark where the thumb opening should be for your hand this should be approximately 7 and 11cm from the bottom place stitch markers or safety pins at the 2 points where you want the opening to be using the wool needle and mattress stitch sew the side seams from the edge to where you placed your marker you will use the ends of the yarn to sew in try on and adjust the size of the thumb opening if needed once you re happy with the size of the opening sew the ends in copyright 2025 talca tangle
